schema.title: Alert ID: {{vars.alertID}} | SDP Task Can not be Created - Mandatory Field Is Missing
schema.description:
Mandatory field missing, Couldn't create SDP Task. Please check & update below mandatory field and trigger the ticket creation manually.

| Fields |
| --- |
| Ticket ID |

message.content:
Couldn't Create SDP Task Please check & update below mandatory field and trigger the ticket creation manually.

 

Field
Ticket ID

arguments.internal_email_subject: A FortiSOAR playbook is requesting your input

schema.title: Alert ID : {{vars.input.records[0].id}} | SDP Request Creation Failed
schema.description:
SDP request creation failed with the below error.
 
| Error |
| --- |
| {{vars.steps.Create_Task1_in_SDP['Error message']}} |
 
Further SDP sync will not happen as corresponding request is not created in SDP. Please resolve the issue to resume the sync. You could follow the below steps to troubleshoot this issue.
 
- If the error is due to insufficient information, please try to add the requested info and trigger the SDP request creation playbook.
- In case if the issue is about connectivity or any other, please contact your FortiSOAR administrator for support.

message.content:
failed to create SDP task1 with the below error. 

 

Error Message {{vars.steps.Create_Task_1_For_Firewall_Alert['Error message']}}

 

Further SDP sync will not happen as corresponding Task is not created in SDP. Please check the issue and contact your FortiSOAR administrator for any support.
